item.title: Cocktails by candlelight: Power outage plunges K Rd bars into darkness
item.description:
Covid-hit Auckland bars and eateries were dealt another blow last night after a power outage on K Rd left customers dining in the dark.
Photos show bars had to resort to candles on tables to keep operating ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz
